column6: Stalked across the zombie-ridden Deadlands by a merciless hunter, Elsa Bloodstone is determined to fight her way out and save the life of a child who relies on her for survival. But Elsa is about to learn that the child is not who (or what!) she originally claimed to be...
column8: | penciller (cover):Ken Lashley | writer:Simon Spurrier | penciller:Kev Walker
